group_1.textLeft: That was delicious, wasn't it?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I might have eaten too much.

group_1.textLeft: Overeatin's the right way to do it!
It's party day after all!

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* It's nice to do so once in a while,@isn't it?
Well? You still worryin'?

group_1.textLeft: ...I-I am okay...
Since Felicia and Mami went first...

group_1.textRight: ...Mm? What are you guys talking about?

group_1.textLeft: Um... Well...you see...

group_1.textRight: I'm pairing with Sana, huh? Nice to meet ya.

group_1.textLeft: Y-yes... It's nice to meet you...

group_1.textRight: What are we gonna do... If they call us I can't@just suddenly come up with somethin'.

group_1.textLeft: (I would like to make moon viewing dango,@and then eat them with everyone, but...)
(Such an ordinary thing...@We would just be copying other people...)

group_1.textRight: You come up with something already?
You look like you have somethin' you@want to say.

group_1.textLeft: ...Well, I can only think of something ordinary...

group_1.textRight: Ordinary...?

group_1.textLeft: .....[wait:0.8][chara:100402:lipSynch_1]Otsukimi dango, that is...
I'm sorry...

group_1.textRight: That's fine, ain't it? If we're lookin' at@the moon, then why not have dango.

group_1.textLeft: But...other people may be preparing the@same thing...

group_1.textRight: Better than nothin' at all.
Besides, who's gonna complain if we do@what they do?

group_1.textLeft: ...No, you're right.
Even so, I am still a little nervous...
But after listening to Mami and Felicia,
I have stopped worrying...!
Kyoko, thank you for having my back.

group_1.textRight: ...I didn't really say much.

group_1.textLeft: So now, instead of thinking too much on it,
I want to share what I like with everyone@so they can enjoy it too...!

group_1.textRight: And that's why...we got Otsukimi dango!

group_1.textLeft: Moon viewing dango're moon viewing@dango after all!

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* When you think of moon viewing,@this platform and the dango piled sky-high...
...are certainly the first things that@come to mind.

group_1.textLeft: You made these too, Kyoko?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, well, Sana kneaded the dough @and I rolled 'em up...

group_1.textLeft: Kyoko, don't...

group_1.textRight: ...Whoops, the rest's a secret.

group_1.textLeft: What's the secret...? What could it be?

group_1.textRight: Forget about it, just grab one and take@a bite.
Felicia, please wait a moment...!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100502:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wha-?! What for?!

group_1.textRight: Ah - a bunny...!

group_1.textLeft: It really is!
Felicia's dango looks like a little bunny.

group_1.textRight: Sure does!

group_1.textLeft: Hehe, what a cute rabbit.

group_1.textRight: Ehehe... I painted them with food coloring...
There's some like that mixed in there.

group_1.textLeft: Huh, but the dango are all gone, aren't they...?

group_1.textRight: Look.

group_1.textLeft: The next batch of moon viewing dango@is here already?!

group_1.textRight: We made lots... So please be on the lookout@for more bunnies.
